title: Grainy photo bug
content:
Hi, in my new pixel 4a sometimes when i take a photo and then go to see it ,after the elaboration process, the photo is very grainy. if i zoom it correct itself and then is ok. 
I think this is a bug because it happens not every time, but is quite annoying.
I tried to wipe camera cache but this not risolved the problem.
Do you have any suggestion?
